name: LiveJournal DARK
description: Turns white to dark. Activate during dim room reading or when eyes are strained.
additional_info:
Feel free to change colours and edit or share to your desire.
If it turns every other site dark:
Click on your Stylish extension icon on your browser.
Locate LiveJournal DARK, hit edit.
Scroll way down and where it says "Applies to:" go on the drop down, select "Urls in the domain" and type in livejournal.com
Be sure to save the changes.
Screenshot: http://i.imgur.com/DcPX6.png
